name: Mortalius(Demo)
description:
It's a really trippy game, I have some WEIRD plans for it.  It's a story game, not much action, but it's still fun. I intend to add puzzles, mysterious characters, and even a boss battle. (Also, aliens, and Area 51. That's DEFINITELY going in there. )

Oh, and if you have like a REALLY good mic and wanna try voice acting, then contact me @ dystro101@gmail.com

WARNING: THIS IS NOT A HORROR GAME!!!! Just because it has a flash light and has dark lighting it doesn't mean it's a horror game.
